title: Understanding Tax Brackets and Tax Rates
description: This chapter explores how tax brackets work in a progressive tax system, the difference between marginal and effective tax rates, and the ethical considerations surrounding tax strategies.
learning_objectives: Explain how progressive tax brackets work
Calculate marginal and effective tax rates
Differentiate between tax avoidance and tax evasion
Analyze how filing status affects tax liability
Evaluate ethical considerations in tax strategy

skill_builder.title: Tax Evasion vs. Avoidance Skill Builder
skill_builder.description: An interactive activity that helps students understand the legal and ethical differences between tax evasion and tax avoidance through case studies and discussion.
